title: A tiny python app for viewing Twilio SMS Logs
author: jastr
content: readme.md twilio sms chat guidebugging twilio sms chats be bit pain. tiny python app, display twilio sms logs look a chat.quick startclone repo > git clone git@github.com:thesimplepostcard/twilio_chat_history.gitcreate virtualenv, install requirements > cd twilio_chat_history > virtualenv env > source env/bin/activate > pip install -r requirements.txtput twilio sid auth token lines 4, 5 main.pyrun server > python main.pyopen browser http://127.0.0.1:8000made the simple postcard - text photo send as postcard
